  • Classes in ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port used by ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka
    Class
    Description
    PersistencePort
    Port that persists reconstructed protocol message pairs to durable storage or downstream systems.
    SegmentPersistencePort
    Port that stores captured TCP segment records for later processing.
  • Classes in ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port used by ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline
    Class
    Description
    FlowAssembler
    Port that aggregates TCP segments for a single flow into ordered byte streams.
    FrameDecoder
    Port that decodes captured link-layer frames into TCP segments for higher-level processing.
    MessageReconstructor
    Port responsible for reconstructing protocol messages from ordered TCP byte streams.
    MetricsPort
    Metrics abstraction for recording counters and distribution samples.
    PacketSource
    Port that provides captured raw frames from a network interface or trace.

    Port that persists reconstructed protocol message pairs to durable storage or downstream systems.
    ProtocolDetector
    Detects the application protocol for a flow based on early payload and port hints.

    Port that stores captured TCP segment records for later processing.
